title: Australian diary. No. 131
brief_description: Magazine items: Mobile classroom N.S.W. A fully equipped train with classrooms and an instructor who lives aboard travels around the rural centres of N.S.W. giving technical training to people of all ages. Football Grand Final - Melbourne. In Victoria, Australian Rules Football is the most popular winter sport. Briefly explains the game and shows the Grand Final Match between Geelong and Richmond. No other credits available.
